events.message: Customer reported a vehicle accident involving a minor collision with another car on a busy street.
Claim categorized under Auto Accident following customer description of the car collision incident.
An agent was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their auto insurance claim for the vehicle accident.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured customer support will be provided throughout.
Customer was requested to submit police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
All required documents including police report and repair receipts were submitted by the customer on time.
Claim investigation started to verify the details of the auto accident and confirm liability and damage extent.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the customer's version of the collision and damage value.
A settlement proposal was made to cover repair costs and other related expenses arising from the vehicle accident.
Customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the service and the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved after customer acceptance of the settlement terms and all investigations.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer's account to cover the approved auto repair expenses.
The auto accident claim case was closed successfully following payment and no further outstanding issues.
